ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups finely ground graham cracker crumbs

cookingTips: Use finely ground crumbs for better structural integrity
Pack crust firmly but not excessively to prevent crumbling
Pre-bake at 350°F for 8-10 minutes if using a no-bake filling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help baker create a sturdy, flavorful crust that complements pie fillings while maintaining proper structure.
